Text: Thank You!  This brings back so many happy memories!

Only complaint I had was that I showed it to my 2 year old and she wasn't interested.
Honestly, the kids of today!
These are good quality.  The episodes are numbered in production order, not broadcast order.  I had to rename them all to match TVDB so XBMC would show the right episodes.  A hassle, but worth it.
